showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “…gulp…
Going do---wn.”{PAUSE}“This floor is the Submarine Dock…”{PAUSE}“Those of you visiting the Underwater Reactor,
please proceed through
the connecting tunnel.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “…gulp…
Going u---p.”{PAUSE}“Returning to Junon.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “How 'bout, whoever stays alive,
gets to take her out?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “All right, you're on!!”{PAUSE}“But…
What if both of us…”

dialogStrings:
“…gulp…
Going do---wn.”{PAUSE}“This floor is the Submarine Dock…”{PAUSE}“Those of you visiting the Underwater Reactor,
please proceed through
the connecting tunnel.”

“How 'bout, whoever stays alive,
gets to take her out?”

“All right, you're on!!”{PAUSE}“But…
What if both of us…”
